sdo:itemDesc.dc:title: Printed form letter from Rudorff family to Schenker, dated December 31, 1916
sdo:itemDesc.dc:description: Announces the death of Ernst Rudorff.
sdo:itemDesc.dc:subject: Krankheit; illness; Herzschlag; heart attack; verscheiden; to pass away

tei:div.tei:p:
HeuteReceipt of this letter is recorded in Schenker's diary at OJ 2/6, p. 601, January 6, 1917: "Parte Professor Ernst Rudorff." ("Death announcement of Professor Ernst Rudorff."). On p. 602, same date: "Condolenzschreiben an die Wittwe Rudorff: Die Mitteilung vom Ableben Ihres hochgeehrten Gatten hat auch mich in tiefste persönliche Trauer versetzt. Seine Zustimmung, sein edler Zuruf waren mir glückverheißende Momente im Kampfe. Ueber alle Tumulte des Tages wird die wirklich nur dem Höchsten und Besten zugewendete Kunstgesinnung, die er vorbildlich vertrat, endgültig triumphieren." ("Letter of condolence to the widow Rudorff: The news of the passing of your highly revered husband has affected even me with the deepest personal sorrow. His endorsement, his noble encouragement were propitious moments for me in the battle. Above all the tumult of the day, his artistic mentality, truly dedicated only to the highest and the best, which he represented in exemplary fashion, will ultimately triumph."). Between the two entries, Schenker went to the sanatorium and discovered that his patroness, Mrs. Sofie Deutsch, had died overnight, thus learning of two deaths on the same day. Nacht 10½ Uhr verschied unerwartet nach kurzer Krankheit am Herzschlag im fast vollendeten 77. LebensjahreErnst Rudorff was born on January 18, 1840. mein geliebter Mann, unser teurer Vater
Professor Dr. h.c. Ernst Rudorff
Mitglied der Königlichen Akademie der Künste.

tei:postscript.tei:p: Feier im Trauerhaus zu Lichterfelde am Donnerstag, den 4. Januar, um 2½ Uhr. Bestattung in Lauenstein (Prov. Hannover).

tei:div.tei:p:
This evening at 10.30 the death occurred from a heart attack after a short illness in the twilight of his 77th year of life of my husband, our dear father
Professor honoris causa Ernst Rudorff
Member of the Royal Academy of the Arts.

tei:postscript.tei:p: Ceremony in the house of mourning at Lichterfelde on Thursday January 4 and 2.30 p.m. Interment in Lauenstein (province Hannover).
